Room.description: Compact bedrooms are suited for single occupancy or short-stay double occupancy as they have limited space and storage.

A warm Tuscan style two-story room with a king size bed and outdoor balcony on the lower level, and a queen size bed in the upper floor loft. This room also contains a shower/tub combination with a granite vanity in the restroom.

A charming suite preserving the heritage in the historic inn building that offers a distinct charm with a private patio, king canopy bed, soaking tub, separate tiled shower, tucked away dining room with a mirror dressing table, and a refrigerator. The Hideaway Suite requires entry through the Towne House Restaurant, as it is located on the second floor of the original historic inn.

This room include two queen size beds, flat screen tv, tiled shower-bath tub combination, a refrigerator, and coffee station. This room also have work desk areas and French doors leading out to either a balcony or veranda.
